name: Dream Speeder
description:
This game is a small endless runner I learned how to create for one of my classes.

Credits and Assets:

The sprites and visuals were all created by me. https://pomps-art.itch.io/dream-speeder-assets

Music by: Jordan Ottesen (jottesen.itch.io)

Sounds by: OmegaPixelArt (omegaosg.itch.io) 

Font from https://www.dafont.com/gang-of-three.font

Background art inspired by a short-film called DAYDREAM created by Seoyeon Kim on Behance. https://www.behance.net/gallery/110452263/DAYDREAM
